Summary: Aon plc (AON) analyzed 1 bill with 1 direct regulatory impact. Direct risk: -0.95. No indirect risks. Minimal overall legislative risk; compliance cost change: 0%.
SummaryKeypoints: REGULATION (EU) 2024/1689 OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL imposes regulation. affecting operations in European Union. with short-term implementation The legislation states: "deployers of certain high-risk AI systems listed in an annex to this Regulation, such as banking or insurance entities, should carry out a fundamental rights impact assessment prior to putting it into use."
